title: Can I use the CBSE XII marksheet in DigiLocker as the official final marksheet? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: No, at the time of addmition in collage you have to submit the original maeksheet provided by the school, however collage provide some time to submit the original document. If you have further problem follow me on quoro and ask what you want to know.
